```{r preliminaries}
library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes)

custom_ggplot <- function(...) {
  ggplot(...) +
    scale_color_colorblind()
}

theme_set(theme_few())
set.seed(123)
```

```{r libraries, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

```{r penguins}
glimpse(penguins)
```

# 1.4 Visualizing distributions

## A categorical variable

```{r barplot}
custom_ggplot(penguins, aes(x = species)) +
  geom_bar()
```

```{r ordered_barplot}
custom_ggplot(penguins, aes(x = fct_infreq(species))) +
  geom_bar()
```

## A numerical variable

```{r histogram, warning=FALSE}
custom_ggplot(penguins, aes(x = body_mass_g)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 200)
```
